QuestData.Title: Vile Touch
QuestData.Description: If these spiders are born with corruption in their veins, then their broodmother must be at the root of this evil.$B$BLet us make our way to the far north end of the cave and seek out Githyiss the Vile. The answers we seek lie with her.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: With Githyiss lie clues to the corruption of Shadowglen and the rest of Teldrassil.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Githyiss the Vile at the northen end of the Shadowthread Cave.
QuestData.CompletionText: I adore these forests. I want to see the corruption purged from them completely. When next I return, I wand to do so with a lighter heart.
QuestData.RewardText: Githyiss and her brood were being corrupted by this totem. This is a furbolg totem.$B$BThis is very troubling indeed. This means the Gnarlpine are still a danger to these forests. We let our guard down too soon.
